articles.title: This Bonobo Just Did Something Scientists Thought Only Humans Could Do - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A bonobo demonstrated the ability to track imaginary objects in controlled tests, challenging the belief that imagination is uniquely human and hinting at deep evolutionary roots. In a set of carefully designed experiments modeled on children’s tea parties, r…
articles.content:
Kanzi, a 43-year-old bonobo living at Ape Initiative, who had been anecdotally reported to engage in pretense and could respond to verbal prompts by pointing. Credit: Ape Initiative
